name: Deployment models
description: Common APIM deployment patterns and what they optimize for.

models.name: Public gateway, public backends
models.tradeoffs: Relies on perimeter controls and backend hardening.

models.name: Public gateway, private backends
models.when: Backends are isolated; APIM mediates controlled access.

models.name: Hybrid with self-hosted gateway
models.when: Backends are in private networks, on-prem, or other clouds, and you want local ingress/egress.
models.tradeoffs: Operational responsibility for the gateway runtime in your environment.

nextSteps: Pick a model that matches backend placement and org network constraints.
If hybrid is required, plan self-hosted gateway lifecycle (deployment, updates, monitoring).
